actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1273.
Placed on calendar in Senate under "Subjects on the Table".

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands to Valley County, Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to Valley County, Idaho.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands to Valley County, Idaho.
